properties.name: supabase.projectId
properties.description: The project id of your supabase project you can find that as Reference ID in your project settings or in the url https://app.supabase.com/project/$projectId

properties.name: supabase.databasePassword
properties.description: The password you provided when creating the supabase project on supabase.com

properties.name: supabase.anonKey
properties.description: The anon project api key, found at Project settings - API

properties.name: supabase.successfulLoginRedirectPage
properties.description: The Path where you want to redirect your User after successfully login in

properties.name: supabase.passwordRecoveryPage
properties.description: The Path where a User gets redirected to change their password

properties.name: supabase.sslOnly
properties.description: Sets the HTTP Cookie as Secure; Set False for local development. Set True for Production.

properties.name: supabase.public
properties.description: You can list here all public paths under the respective HTTP Methods

properties.name: supabase.public
properties.description: You can list here all public paths under the respective HTTP Methods

properties.name: supabase.public.get
properties.description: You can list here all public paths that should be accessible by GET HTTP Method

properties.name: supabase.public.post
properties.description: You can list here all public paths that should be accessible by POST HTTP Method

properties.name: supabase.public.delete
properties.description: You can list here all public paths that should be accessible by DELETE HTTP Method

properties.name: supabase.public.put
properties.description: You can list here all public paths that should be accessible by PUT HTTP Method

properties.name: supabase.jwtSecret
properties.description: The JWT secret, found at Project settings - API

properties.name: supabase.unauthenticatedPage
properties.description: The Page the User will get redirected to when he is not logged in and tries to access a non public resource

properties.name: supabase.unauthorizedPage
properties.description: The Page the User will get redirected to when a logged in User doesn't have the right to access a resource

properties.name: supabase.otpCreateUser
properties.description: When a new user requests a OTP should a user be created? If set to false this will create a
